languages.text: "П-почему ваш цвет так резко сменился на темно-бурый?"

traits.locale_text: "П-почему ваш цвет так резко сменился на темно-бурый?"

languages.text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"
languages.original_text: "П-почему ваш цвет так резко сменился на темно-бурый?"

traits.locale_text: "W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of umber?"
"W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of umber?"
"W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of maroon?"
"W-why did your colours so suddenly turn to dark shades of maroon?"
"W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"
"W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

languages.text: 「な…なぜ突然孤独の影の如き色に変わってしまったのですか？」
languages.original_text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: 「な…なぜ突然孤独の影の如き色に変わってしまったのですか？」

languages.text: “你……你的颜色怎么突然变成了深黑色？”
languages.original_text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: “你……你的颜色为什么突然变成了深黑色？”

languages.text: «¿P-por qué sus colores se han vuelto de repente del rojo más oscuro?».
languages.original_text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: «¿P-por qué sus colores se han vuelto de repente del rojo más oscuro?».

languages.text: "W-Warum sind Eure Farben plötzlich so dunkelbraun geworden?"
languages.original_text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: "W-Warum sind Eure Farben plötzlich so dunkelbraun geworden?"

languages.text: « P-pourquoi vos couleurs ont subitement viré au marron foncé ? »
languages.original_text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: « P-pourquoi vos couleurs ont subitement viré au marron foncé ? »

languages.text: "N... Neden bir anda renklerin bordoya döndü?"
languages.original_text: "W-why have your colours turned so suddenly to dark shades of maroon?"

traits.locale_text: "Neden... Neden bir anda renklerin bordoya döndü?"
